00001 <?php
00008   function authenticate($userid, $passwd)
00009   {
00010         $link = new DbConnector('');
00011 
00012     $query = "SELECT id, username, passwd, level FROM users_list WHERE " .
00013              "username = '" . $userid .
00014              "' AND passwd = '" . md5($passwd) . "' LIMIT 1";
00015     $result = $link->query($query);
00016     if ($link->getNumRows($result) > 0)
00017     {
00018       $user = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00019       $id = $user["id"];
00020       $_SESSION["user_name"] = $user["username"];
00021       $_SESSION["user_level"] = intval($user["level"]);
00022     }
00023     else
00024     {
00025       $id = 0;
00026     }
00027 
00028     $link->close();
00029 
00030     return $id;
00031   }

00045   {
00046     print "User " . $_SESSION["user_name"] . " succesfully logged in!" . LF;

00049   {
